title: Jon Day
deck: I'm married to Ellen we live with our 3 fast growing boys near the old Terry's chocolate factory. I work at Christians Against Poverty in Bradford, which was a dream job for me. It was the main thing that prompted our family move up from London. I'm now the only southerner in a house of northerners! As a family we really enjoy people. Our ideal is having a house full of diverse people relaxing, having fun, eating together and developing friendships.
